recipesJson.name: Fresh picked pear
recipesJson.author: Djbrandnew
recipesJson.description: My goal with this was to get a fresh pear taste. I used the inw pear as main flavor bc i feel it gives that almost ripe gritty texture you get from a fresh pear. The fw pear helps build the pear flavor bringing some sweetness and slight juiciness to it. The touch of jf lemon juicy was the last part and in my opinion brought the best of adding a little more pop to the other flavors along with building that juicy sweet taste to the recipe.
